text: Rodolfo Oroz (1895-1997) was a Chilean professor, and philologist. He won the Chilean National Prize for Literature in 1978. Sixth President of the Academia Chilena de la Lengua (1959-1980). ==References== ==Other websites== * Memoria chilena Category:1895 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Writers from Santiago
title: Rodolfo Oroz
